welcome_message_title: Welcome to Alphen aan den Rijn
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alphen aan den Rijn! This charming city is known for its picturesque canals, historic architecture, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Alphen aan den Rijn has to offer during your stay.
